items.sentence: I wish I could remember everything Tom told me.
I can\'t get along with the neighbors any more.
Tom kept Mary awake all night with his snoring.
Tom kept every love letter Mary ever wrote him.
Tom didn\'t say anything about why he was late.
We would rather go to the zoo than to the park.
Last night, I went to sleep with the lights on.
Tom isn\'t the only one who missed the meeting.
Tom used to love Mary. Now he can\'t stand her.
I wish that we didn\'t have to do this anymore.
Tom advised Mary to leave early in the morning.
Tom should tell Mary that she needs to do that.
Tom soon realized the seriousness of his error.
Tom speaks English with a strong French accent.
What would it take to get you to join our team?
What would you do if you had a billion dollars?
Everybody in the room let out a sigh of relief.
For Tom, getting fired was an unexpected shock.
The best day of my life was the day I met Mary.
The dance had already started when I got there.
